title: Awarding the contracts for supplying fuel required for the Aircraft of SriLankan Airlines
decision_details:
- Limited International Competitive Bids have been invited to award the contracts for the supply of fuel required for the aircraft of the SriLankan Airlines at the international airports of Paris, Canton, Dhaka, Dubai, Gan Island, Jeddah and Bangalore, Cochin, Chennai, Delhi, Madurasi, Mumbai, Thiruvananthapuram and Tiruchirappalli in India. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Planning and Economic Development to award the relevant contracts as follows for a period of two (02) years, based on the recommendations of the Standing High Level Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
